title: (x) Wallpaper\* nameplate - custom designed (similar to FF Meta, Amplitude) {Jan E, Marc O}
content:
thanks for helping

 [‹ Frank Mohn AS - Which Futura is this?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124130/http:/typophile.com/node/39684 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wonderful but unknown Jugendstil metal type - Vienna {Alexander} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124130/http:/typophile.com/node/39098 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tobt

comments.content: Actually, I believe it’s based on Amplitude from Font Bureau.

Not Amplitude. I think Jan’s correct as usual.

It looks slightly wider than Meta, though.

Probably more correct to say based on Meta

\> Probably more correct to say based on Meta

Yep.

Thanks for the complement, btw.
Based on both. Further reading on Typophile [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071204124130/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=nl&q=site%3Atypophile.com+wallpaper&btnG=Zoeken&lr=).
